page.title: 08FAUGHHILL FARM
page.content: Faughhill Farm is a large farm with an area of about 850 acres.The farm is owned by a group of businessmen who own three farms in the area including Faughhill Farm. The farm has a manager to keep things running smoothly and has{300}sheep and about 100 cattle.Its main crops are oilseed_rape,potatoes,wheat,barley and turnips.The land is hilly and three quarters of it is used for grazing the sheep and cattle.One quarter is used for the crops.The farm has six tractors and owns Lady Moss (a loch) and various streams and old quarries.
